method.description: The method by which the product can be shipped.

priceInformation.description: Pricing information related to this shipping destination.

Destination.description: Detailed information about the shipping destination.

availabilityMessage.description: A message about the product's availability.

availabilityStatus.description: Status information relevant to the product's availability.

AvailabilityInformation.description: Detailed information about the product's availability.

slug.description: The unique identifier for this category node.

Category.description: A single category that is part of a larger taxonomy.

ImageUrls.description: All the images available for the product. The images are specified as URLs.

deliveryInformation.description: Delivery information, such as where the product ships from and where it can ship to

ShippingInformation.description: Detailed information related to shipping the product.

availabilityInformation.description: Detailed information about the product's availability.

averageRating.description: The average of all the product's ratings.

categories.description: A set of categories that this product belongs to. This list only includes unique leaf nodes that a category resides in.

features.description: A list of the product's features.

groupId.description: Identifier used to indicate this product is part of a group. All products in the group will have the same groupId.

groupName.description: A general name for a group of products. An example would be "Iphone 6" instead of "Red Iphone 6 32GB".

imageUrls.description: All the images available for the product. The images are specified as URLs.

language.description: A BCP47 language tag describing the localization of the product's text.

longDescription.description: A detailed description of the product.

merchant.description: The merchant from which the product is sourced.

merchantPriceInformation.description: Pricing information for the product. Note that this does not include shipping costs since shipping is relative to the shipping address.

options.description: A set containing options available for the product. Examples include color, size, etc...

psid.description: The unique identifier for the product within a Bridge2 Solutions environment.

releaseDateTime.description: The date the product was made available for purchase.

shippingInformation.description: Detailed information related to shipping the product.

shortDescription.description: A short description of the product.

totalReviews.description: The total number of reviews available for the product.

Product.description: Detailed information related to an individual Product.

fileName.description: The name of the file to be imported by the job

DeliverySource.description: Information related to shipping origin of the product.

destinations.description: A list of valid shipping destinations.

source.description: Information related to shipping origin of the product.

DeliveryInformation.description: Information about where the product ships from and where it can ship to.

label.description: The user friendly display label for the Option. Color, Size, etc...

name.description: Represents the unique identifier for the option and is not intended to be displayed to the user. color, size, etc...

value.description: The value for the Option. blue, large, etc...

Option.description: An option available for a product. Examples include color, size, etc...

fees.description: The sum of all the applicable fees related to shipping the product to this destination. The value is expressed as an ISO-4217 compliant three character currency code followed by a decimal number. Example: USD 5.25

shippingCost.description: The cost to ship the product to this destination. The value is expressed as an ISO-4217 compliant three character currency code followed by a decimal number. Example: USD 5.25

DestinationPriceInformation.description: Pricing information related to this shipping destination.

endDatetime.description: The date/time when the job completed

fileName.description: The name of the file being imported by this job

id.description: The unique id of the job

progress.description: The current progress of the job: the number of records processed and the total records count

startDatetime.description: The date/time when the job was started

status.description: The current status of the job

basePrice.description: The price of the product excluding any taxes or fees. The value is expressed as an ISO-4217 compliant three character currency code followed by a decimal number. Example: USD 5.25

msrp.description: The manufacturer's suggested retail price of the product excluding any taxes or fees. The value is expressed as an ISO-4217 compliant three character currency code followed by a decimal number. Example: USD 5.25

MerchantPriceInformation.description: Pricing information for the product. Note that this does not include shipping costs since shipping is relative to the shipping address.

processed.description: The number of records processed so far.

total.description: The total number of records to process.

JobProgress.description: Import job progress: total number of records to process and the number of records processed so far.
